title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-3.4 - Minutes of authority meetings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-3.4 - Minutes of authority meetings

State Regulations
A complete transcript of the minutes of each meeting of
the authority shall be forwarded in duplicate to the division within 10 days
after the meeting. Thus, in the case of authorities operating both Federal- and

State-subsidized projects, the minutes may pertain to either or both programs, but they must be submitted in their entirety. The submission of extracts which
are applicable to the State-subsidized projects alone is not acceptable. The
division will not formally acknowledge receipt of the
minutes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-3.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
